overview: A shy, young bookstore clerk, (Carmen Luvana) stumbles upon a book filled with erotic adventures. The more she reads, the more she is mysteriously drawn into the book's lurid stories and sexually adventurous characters. Ultimately the erotic fantasies, so vividly detailed, become her reality. This transforms the formerly reserved young girl into a sexually charged, wildly uninhibited young woman. It is only then that she realizes her true destiny.
title: Innocence
